author: —William Crawford
qoute: “Being a student is easy. Learning requires actual work.”

author: —Tom Colicchio
qoute: “Recipes tell you nothing. Learning techniques is the key.”

author: —Herbert Spencer
qoute: “The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.”

author: —John Dewey
qoute: “Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.”

author: —Alvin Toffler
qoute: “The illiterate of the 21st century will not be those who cannot read and write, but those who cannot learn, unlearn, and relearn.”
